  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_363</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_363</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Sistemas de ecuaciones lineales, interpretación gráfica. Clasificación</string>
            <string language="en">Systems of linear equations. Graphical interpretation and classification.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Systeme der linearen Gleichungen. 
Graphische Deutung und Klassifikation.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Systèmes des équations linéaires. 
Traduction et classification graphiques.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistemas de equações lineares. 
Interpretação e classificação gráficas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemi delle equazioni lineari. 
Interpretazione e classificazione grafiche.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συστήματα των γραμμικών εξισώσεων. Γραφικές 
ερμηνεία και ταξινόμηση.</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los sistemas de ecuaciones lineales. Se estudia la discusión de un sistema de ecuaciones lineales dependiente de un parámetro, su resolución y su interpretación geométrica.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study systems of linear equations. It explains how to examine a system of linear equations that depend on a parameter, how to solve it and its geometrical interpretation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parámetro</string>
            <string language="en">parameter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">interpretación geométrica</string>
            <string language="en">geometrical interpretation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sistema</string>
            <string language="en">system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">lineal</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch Simulationen, 
Systeme der linearen Gleichungen zu studieren. Sie erklärt, wie
man überprüft ein System der linearen Gleichungen, die von einem 
Parameter abhängen, wie man ihn und seine geometrische Deutung löst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations simulations 
d'étudier des systèmes des équations linéaires. Elle 
explique comment examiner un système des équations linéaires qui 
dépendent d'un paramètre, comment résoudre lui et sa traduction 
géométrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar sistemas 
de equações lineares. Explica como examinar um sistema das 
equações lineares que dependem de um parâmetro, como resolver o e 
sua interpretação geométrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni studiare i 
sistemi delle equazioni lineari. Spiega come esaminare un 
sistema delle equazioni lineari che dipendono da un parametro, come 
risolvere esso e la relativa interpretazione geometrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στα συστήματα μελέτης των γραμμικών εξισώσεων. Εξηγεί πώς 
να εξετάσει ένα σύστημα των γραμμικών εξισώσεων που εξαρτώνται 
από μια παράμετρο, πώς να λύσουν τον και τη γεωμετρική ερμηνεία 
της.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parameter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geometrische Deutung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">paramètre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
